description: This contract has a couple of off-chain-views.

views.name: an-empty-useless-view
views.description:
This view has no implementations …

Which is indeed useless.

annotations.name: %the_decisive_argument
annotations.description: The integer argument if >0 this will fail.

annotations.name: %negative_even_number
annotations.description: The result, if any, is twice the argument (%the_decisive_argument).

views.name: multiply-the-nat-in-storage
views.description: This one is pure, it multiplies the natural number given as argument with the one in storage.

annotations.name: %arg_one
annotations.description: This is also ignored, but different.

annotations.name: %arg_one_result
annotations.description: This is %arg_one on the resulting side.

annotations.name: %arg_two
annotations.description:
This is also ignored, but with a lot of data

Lorem ipsuming and all.

views.name: an-empty-useless-view
views.description:
This view has a bunch of implementations …

They are all meaningless.

annotations.name: %ret
annotations.description: The address of the (any) contract, re-obtained in Michelson.
